* Represents a task that is a deadline. A Deadline object corresponds to a
* Task that has a description, a completion status, and a date by which the task should be completed.
* @param description The description of the deadline.
* @param date The date on which the deadline falls.
* Constructor for a Deadline, initialised with a completion status.
* @param description The description of the deadline.
* @param date The date on which the deadline falls.
* @param status The completion status of the deadline.
public Deadline(String description, String date, String status) {
* Returns the string representation of the type of task.
* @return The string representation of the type of task.
* Returns the description of the deadline.
* Returns the string representation of the deadline.
* @return The string representation of the deadline.
return String.format("%s:%s:%s:%s\n", this.getType(), this.getStatus(), this.description, this.date);
* Represents a task that is an event. An Event object corresponds to a
* Task that has a description, a completion status, and a date on which it happens.
* @param description The description of the event.
* @param date The date on which the event occurs.
* Constructor for an Event, initialised with a completion status.
* @param description The description of the event.
* @param date The date on which the event occurs.
* @param status The completion status of the event.
public Event(String description, String date, String status) {
* Returns the string representation of the type of task.
* @return The string representation of the type of task.
* Returns the description of the event.
* Returns the string representation of the event.
* @return The string representation of the event.
return String.format("%s:%s:%s:%s\n", this.getType(), this.getStatus(), this.description, this.date);
